bibl.title: The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 6.)
bibl.note: 10 contributions. - Section 1. The Dakhleh Oasis in Prehistory. - Section 2. The Dakhleh Oasis in the Roman Period. - Section 3. Past Populations of Dakhleh: An Antropological Perspective.
MARLOW C.A. and A.J. MILLS (Edd.), The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project. (Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 6.)
Oxford, Oxbow Books, 2001, 4°, ix-111 pp., tabl., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 1-900188-54-6. £45.
